attributes.action: Abolish tuition fees for student/trainee nurses.
attributes.additional_details: The government is helping individual citizens and businesses to cope during this pandemic. Much is being made of front line NHS staff, but the role played by trainee nurses is being ignored. Many of them are still in their teens, but are expected to work long hours unpaid, and are witnessing horrific suffering and death on Covid 19 wards.
attributes.background: Student nurses are working front line in the treatment of Covid 19 patients, at personal risk to themselves, and are expected to pay tuition fees even when working on wards. At present, due to the crisis, trainee nurses are spending 80% of their time on wards.

rejection.details:
We have published a number of petitions about tuition fees and loans for NHS staff and other key workers, which you might like to sign: 

Write off all student loans for all NHS staff fighting COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310559 

Reimburse nurses for student loans and fund all fees for future student nurses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302732 

Reduce student debt for student nurses and midwives: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300079 

 
Suspend student loan repayments for doctors, nurses and midwives during COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308456 

Forgive student debt of all key workers after Pandemic crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307985 

Fund all medical degrees to support future doctors and nurses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309404
